title: Machen2 vs. Machen1
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:black-highlighter-theme]]
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:hansarp]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:wide-image-sizer]]
[[module css]]
@import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Bahiana&display=swap');

:root{
--white: 244, 244, 244;
--dark: 46, 14, 2;
--medium-accent: 212, 104, 0;
--bright-accent: 242, 133, 0;
--toggle-roundness: 0;
--swatch-text-light: var(--white);
--swatch-menutxt-light-color: var(--white);
--link-color: 242, 133, 0;
--visited-link-color: 189, 107, 0;
--borderColor: #ff8c00 !important;
}
#header {
     --header-h1-font-size: calc(var(--base-font-size)*3.25);
     --header-title: "MACHEN2 VS. MACHEN1";
     --header-title-mobile: "THE GREAT MACHEN DUEL";
     --swatch-headerh1-color: var(--bright-accent);
}
[[/module]]
[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]
[[=]]
[[size 200%]]**About the Author:**[[/size]]
[[/=]]
[[=]]

[[include component:image-block
    name=https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-2747/coverart.jpg |
    caption= //What is Machen II?// |
    align=center |
    width=100%
]]

@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
These things are sure:
[[/=]]
* Machen II is (most likely) not the Pope.
* Machen II is (most likely) not Japanese prime Minister Fumio Kishida.
* Machen II is (most likely) not US president Joseph Biden.
* Machen II is (most likely) not French president Emmanuel Macron.
* Machen II is (apparently) not an (arrested) convict.
* Machen II is (shockingly) not game developer Yoko Taro.
* Machen II is (most likely) not you.
* Machen II is (most likely) not your parents.
* Machen II is (most likely) not your friend(s(assuming you have more than one)).
* Machen II is (most likely) not Machen1, Machen I, or Machen //Numero Uno//
[[=]]
So, what //is// Machen2?

Well....
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
**YOU'LL NEVER KNOW!** (unless you start scrolling, ig)
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
Why are you scrolling?
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
**I AM ##red|G## ##steelblue|O## ##yellow|D##**
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
Wh—what do you mean you're Machen1? 
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
//Oh, hell, no-//
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
------

[[size 200%]]**{{PRAISE ABOUT MACHEN}}**[[/size]]
------
"Any problem on earth can be solved with the careful application of fire and burning :)" - [[*user AnAnomalousWriter]], lighting a torch

"This guy once used to be a demonic overlord! Now look what he's reduced to... an SCP author" - [[*user Jack Waltz]], coalescing in the Void

"cheeseburger" - [[*user EstrellaYoshte]], at a McDonald's 

"Lmao" - [[*user Liryn]], tangoing 

"harbaluns. The wimbforstackle hits high in the airday"  [[*user GremlinGroup]], squinting at the dark sky

"Smell" - [[*user Calibold]], stuck in a sewer

"Machen's got some way to go, but they've been a great contribution to the site -- whether intentional at times or not!" - [[*user JakDragonX]], whilst clubbing Machen1 over the head

"Machen2? What happened to Machen1?" - [[*user Cole 13]], investigating into the disappearance 

"Who are you and why are you in my house???" - [[*user TroyL]], wielding a comically large sword

"To you, yes, this goes to you, click [# here] and upvote my stuff, don't be like Machen, that guy downvoted my first coldpost, can you even? Yeah, don't be like them, upvote that." - [[*user TheDarkArtist]], about to be murdered

"this is the least organic way to get quotes for your author page" - [[*user stephlynch]], disapproving 

//"The moon is out and rising
And silent is the night
My face is pale and hiding
Behind the neon light
The seven is my number
Temptation is my game
I came from six feet under
And Machen1... Machen1 is my name!"// 
- [[*user MrIverson]], unmasked, oh god

"朋友是一个坚韧不拔的纪录片， 在香港这座城市的设置。 主演：钱德勒 索罗斯 傅博斯 瑞秋 莫妮卡 和一些其他他妈的演员。" - [[*user aftokrator]], using google translate 

[[include :scp-wiki:component:sybadge code=scl]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:sybadge code=clb]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:sybadge code=mww]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:sybadge code=pvr]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:sybadge code=tsf]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:sybadge code=awb]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:sybadge code=dado]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:sybadge code=lgbt]]
------
= [[size 200%]]**{{SCPS}}**[[/size]]
------
Probably start with 6036 or 6358, and read the rest if you want

[[size 10%]]ignore 5671. dont read it. just don't[[/size]]

[[size 123%]]**[[[SCP-6790]]] - death by duck by dado** (ft. Gooday)[[/size]]
[[size 123%]]**[[[SCP-6036]]] - A Hand to Hold** (ft. Waltz)[[/size]]
[[size 123%]]**[[[SCP-6989]]] - Clouds and Clouds, All Around** (ft. Waltz)[[/size]]
[[size 123%]]**[[[SCP-6989-J]]] - Old Man Yells At Clouds**[[/size]]
[[size 123%]]**[[[SCP-6225]]] -  A King of Nothing**[[/size]]
[[size 123%]]**[[[SCP-5671]]] - Before I Wake**[[/size]]
[[size 123%]]**[[[SCP-6358]]] - MESSIAH**[[/size]]
[[size 123%]]**[[[SCP-6744]]] - And the world moved on**[[/size]]
------
= [[size 200%]]**{{TALES}}**[[/size]]
------
//Definitely// start with Fire & Hate

[[size 123%]]**[[[I, HUB]]]** - ft. way too many people[[/size]]
[[size 123%]]**[[[image in mail by dado]]]**[[/size]]
[[size 123%]]**[[[LACHRYMOSE]]]**[[/size]]
[[size 123%]]**[[[FIRE AND HATE|FIRE & HATE]]]**[[/size]]
[[size 123%]]**[[[I, WANT YOU ALL TO STOP]]]**[[/size]]

------
[[size 200%]]**{{OTHER}}**[[/size]]
------
[[size 123%]]**[[[art:everest|EVEREST]]]** - FANART[[/size]]
[[size 123%]]**[[[art:a-normal-day|A NORMAL DAY]]]** - FANART[[/size]]
[[size 123%]]**[[[secure-facility-dossier-site-300|SECURE FACILITY DOSSIER SITE-300]]]** - SITE DOSSIER[[/size]]
[[/=]]

^^My account has changed to [[*user Machen II]], due to the previous one being wikifucked. Forward any messages there, if needed. For immediate response preferably use Discord.^^

[[collapsible show="If I Die..." hide="...I'll Come Back As a Ghost To Haunt This Wiki!"]]
If I get wiped out from existence by a painting doing the wâtsu, and my minor echoes in this wiki die out, my coauthors get full control on their respective pages. If there's any solo works I do in the future, like this author page, when I die screaming, I would like to give control of those pages to [[*user jack waltz]], [[*user AnAnomalousWriter]], [[*user Roundabouts]] and [[*user TheDarkArtist]]. They can work out what to do with these together. 

I can be contacted on Discord, Twitter, or underneath your bed if needed.
